DOC.brief_summary: The eyelid warming device design relieve symptom dysfunction glands eyelid . Prospective , non comparative , open , monocentre study . The objective : - To verify establish temperature eyelid cornea eye 10 minute device application - To evaluate ocular surface , NIBUT IOP device application - To determine acceptability healthy volunteer practical use device The subject attend 2 visit .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Safety Study Eyelid Warming Device Evaluate Eyelid Cornea Temperature Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 80 year old . Healthy volunteer . For contact lens wearer , must wear hydrogel contact lens ( worn least 3 time per week ) Normal ocular examination eye .
